```json
{
  "email_chain": [
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-01 09:30",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nHope you're well. I received your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Port Arthur to Rotterdam. We have a Panamax vessel available with a DWT of 75,000 MT and LOA of 225m. Initial freight quote is in the low 50s.\n\nLet me know your thoughts.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-01 11:15",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThanks for the info. The vessel specs look good. Can we discuss the freight rate a bit more? We were hoping for something closer to $50.50. Also, could you provide some details on the laycan and demurrage terms?\n\nThanks,\nJohn"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-01 13:00",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nUnderstood. We can negotiate the rate. How about we meet in the middle at $50.75? For the laycan, we can offer a window from November 15th to November 25th. Demurrage is standard at $20,000 per day.\n\nLooking forward to your feedback.\n\nBest,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-02 09:45",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThanks for the updated terms. $50.75 works for us. However, we need to adjust the laycan to November 20th to November 30th due to some logistical constraints.\n\nPlease confirm if this is feasible.\n\nThanks,\nJohn"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-02 11:30",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nNo problem, we can adjust the laycan to November 20th to November 30th. Everything else remains the same. Please confirm if we are good to proceed with the booking.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-02 14:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThanks for the flexibility. We are good to proceed with the booking at the agreed terms.\n\nLooking forward to a successful shipment.\n\nBest,\nJohn"
    }
  ],
  "labels": {
    "broker": "Sarah",
    "commodity": "Crude Oil",
    "load_port": "Port Arthur",
    "discharge_port": "Rotterdam",
    "cargo_size": "",
    "incoterm": "",
    "vessel": "Panamax",
    "dwt": "75,000 MT",
    "loa": "225m",
    "starting_freight_quote_currency": "USD",
    "starting_freight_quote": "low 50s",
    "final_freight_quote_currency": "USD",
    "final_freight_quote": "50.75",
    "laytime_start_date": "2023-11-20",
    "laytime_end_date": "2023-11-30",
    "demurrage_currency": "USD",
    "demurrage": "20000"
  }
}
```

```json
{
  "email_chain": [
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Quote Request",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-01T14:30:00",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nFollowing our phone conversation, I’m pleased to offer you a freight rate in the low 50s for the shipment of crude oil from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel available is the MV Sea Star, with a DWT of 110,000 tons and LOA of 230m.\n\nLet me know your thoughts and if you need any further details.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Quote Request",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-01T16:45:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThanks for the offer. We are looking at a cargo size of approximately 100,000 tons. Could you confirm the laycan period and demurrage rates? Also, we were hoping for a rate closer to $50.75.\n\nLooking forward to your response.\n\nBest,\nJohn"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Quote Request",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-02T09:15:00",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nThanks for getting back to me. The laycan period we can offer is from October 15th to October 20th. Demurrage is set at $15,000 per day.\n\nRegarding the freight rate, we can meet you at $50.75. Please confirm if this works for you.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Quote Request",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-02T11:30:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThank you for the update. The laycan period and demurrage rate are acceptable. However, we need to confirm the final freight rate with our team. I’ll get back to you shortly.\n\nThanks,\nJohn"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Quote Request",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-03T10:00:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nAfter discussing with our team, we are ready to proceed with the freight rate of $50.75. Please send over the final contract for review.\n\nLooking forward to working with you.\n\nBest,\nJohn"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "to": "John (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Final Contract",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-03T14:20:00",
      "body": "Hi John,\n\nGreat to hear that! I’ve attached the final contract for your review. Please let me know if there are any changes needed.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "John (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Crude Oil Shipment - Final Contract",
      "timestamp": "2023-10-04T09:45:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nThe contract looks good. We are ready to sign. Thanks for your assistance throughout this process.\n\nBest,\nJohn"
    }
  ],
  "labels": {
    "broker": "Sarah",
    "commodity": "Crude Oil",
    "load_port": "Houston",
    "discharge_port": "Rotterdam",
    "cargo_size": "100,000 tons",
    "incoterm": "",
    "vessel": "MV Sea Star",
    "dwt": "110,000 tons",
    "loa": "230m",
    "starting_freight_quote_currency": "USD",
    "starting_freight_quote": "low 50s",
    "final_freight_quote_currency": "USD",
    "final_freight_quote": "50.75",
    "laytime_start_date": "2023-10-15",
    "laytime_end_date": "2023-10-20",
    "demurrage_currency": "USD",
    "demurrage": "15,000"
  }
}
```
